name: coventry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a city in central England: I live in Northampton but come from Coventry. She was studying at Coventry University at the time.
More examplesFewer examplesTwo-tone music originated in the West Midlands town of Coventry.The train was 40 minutes late by the time it reached Coventry.It only takes half an hour to get from Coventry to Birmingham.Benjamin Britten's "War Requiem" was composed for the reconsecration of Coventry Cathedral in 1962.
